ticket.title: SQL error on Postgress
ticket.original-body:
I am getting an PGError when using the following code snippet to search for all records that have an expirationDate greater than today.
campaigns = Table(:users) campaigns.where(campaigns[:expirationDate].gt(Date.today.midnight))
According to this error it looks like the '*' is missing between the select and from.
ActionView::Template::Error (PGError: ERROR: syntax error at or near "FROM" LINE 1: SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expiration... ^ : SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expirationDate" > '2010-04-22 06:00:00.000000')

ActionView::Template::Error (PGError: ERROR: syntax error at or near "FROM" LINE 1: SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expiration... ^ : SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expirationDate" > '2010-04-22 06:00:00.000000')
ticket.original-body-html:
I am getting an PGError when using the following code snippet to search for all records that have an expirationDate greater than today.

campaigns = Table(:users)
campaigns.where(campaigns[:expirationDate].gt(Date.today.midnight))

According to this error it looks like the '*' is missing between the select and from.

ActionView::Template::Error (PGError: ERROR: syntax error at or near "FROM"
LINE 1: SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expiration...

                ^

: SELECT FROM "users" WHERE "users"."expirationDate" > '2010-04-22 06:00:00.000000')

version.title: SQL error on Postgress

version.body: Could you submit a failing test case for this issue please?
version.body-html: Could you submit a failing test case for this issue please?
version.title: SQL error on Postgress

version.body: It turns out that I made a mistake in my code. The name of the table was incorrect. Sorry for the mistake.
version.body-html: It turns out that I made a mistake in my code. The name of the table was incorrect. Sorry for the mistake.
version.title: SQL error on Postgress
